applications.name: AI Resume Matcher
applications.description: Last month, a friend of mine called me sounding defeated. He’d been applying to dozens of jobs, sending out resume after resume, and wasn’t getting a single callback. “I just wish I knew what I’m doing wrong,” he said. That one line hit me — because I’ve worked in the HR space for years, and I’ve seen this happen from the other side too.  The truth is, most job applications never even make it to a recruiter. Around 78% of resumes get filtered out by software — the ATS systems companies use to scan and shortlist candidates. Good people often get ignored simply because their resume doesn’t match the exact keywords or format the system is looking for. They’re not rejected for lack of talent — they’re just lost in translation.  That’s when it clicked. With my experience in HR, I know how the backend works. I’ve seen how systems scan resumes, what recruiters look for, and where candidates often go wrong. So I thought — why not turn that insight into something useful for job seekers? Why not build a solution that gives people real feedback, based on how these systems actually work?  That’s how AI Resume Matcher was born. It’s a simple tool that helps job seekers stop guessing and start applying smarter. You just upload your resume, paste the job description (or job link), and get an instant match score. It shows you what you’re missing, what you’ve done right, and exactly how to improve. If you need help fixing it, the AI can even generate improved resume content or a tailored cover letter on the spot.  This isn’t just another resume builder. It’s built from real HR experience, powered by smart AI, and designed to give job seekers the edge they need. Whether you're switching careers, just starting out, or trying to land that dream job — this tool makes the process feel more in your control.  Instead of applying to 50 jobs and hearing nothing, people can now send 10 well-optimized resumes and actually get results. I’ve seen how frustrating job searching can be — and this i

Devdash connects  business owners with a vetted pool of Webflow, WordPress, React and AI-site specialists, matching them in seconds through an AI brief-to-match engine that reads a plain-language project description and translates it into structured filters. Every seller’s profile is reviewed by hand before going live; buyers fund projects through Stripe-backed escrow, and both parties collaborate inside a shared project room that bundles chat, milestones and deliverables. Behind the scenes Devdash runs on a Supabase Postgres database (with pgvector for similarity search) and OpenAI for embeddings and function-calling, while Resend handles transactional email. applications.description: Inspiration: Growing up in Rwanda and working closely with students, cyber cafés, and self-taught developers, I noticed a common limitation: most creative and developer tools require constant internet access, subscriptions, or powerful devices. That left many talented people without access to basic tools they needed.  We asked ourselves ,what if creativity didn’t depend on any of that? What if someone could edit videos, compress images, test APIs, write code, convert files, or create documents, all in the browser, completely offline?  That’s what inspired EditForge Pro — an all-in-one creative and developer suite designed to run entirely in the browser, with zero setup, zero sign-up, and complete privacy.  What it does EditForge Pro is a browser-based suite of over 25 tools that work completely offline. It covers a wide range of needs:  For creatives: video, audio, image editors, PDF tools, quote generators, and more  For developers: code editor, API tester, JSON formatter, hash and password tools  For students and researchers: text editor, lyrics finder, Wikipedia search  For everyday users: file converters, QR and calendar generators, screen recorder, unit converter, and more  All tools are designed to work without relying on APIs, external services, or user accounts. Everything runs locally, offering privacy and reliability.  How we built it EditForge Pro was developed using:  HTML, CSS (with Tailwind) for the user interface  Vanilla JavaScript modules for logic and tool isolation  Vite.js as the bundler and development environment  IndexedDB and LocalStorage to store preferences and process files locally  Service Workers for offline-first behavior  Netlify for free and fast global deployment  Each tool was built modularly, allowing them to work independently while sharing a consistent design and experience. applications.name: Native Heal
applications.description: 🌿 What is Native Heal? Native Heal is a digital platform built to connect patients with trusted traditional healers in a secure, convenient, and culturally respectful way.  🔍 What Problem Does It Solve? In many African communities, traditional healing is often the first point of care, but the experience is largely offline, fragmented, and built on word-of-mouth referrals. This creates issues like:  Difficulty finding credible healers  Lack of standard booking and communication channels  No visibility into healer expertise or reviews  No digital tools for healers to manage their practice  💡 What Inspired It? As someone deeply rooted in African heritage and passionate about health access, I saw how undervalued and unsupported traditional healers are in the digital world. Many operate informally through Facebook groups or WhatsApp. I wanted to build a trusted, empowering bridge between ancient wisdom and modern tech — honoring our traditions while giving healers tools to thrive.  👥 Who Is It For? Patients who want to safely find and consult with traditional healers.  Healers who want to grow their practice, reach more clients, and manage bookings professionally.  Cultural advocates who care about preserving indigenous knowledge.  🚀 Key Features 🔎 Search & Filter: Find healers by specialisation (e.g., fertility, child health, dream interpretation)  💬 Messaging: Patients and healers can chat securely in-app  📆 Bookings: Patients can request consultations (synchronous or scheduled)  ⭐ Ratings & Reviews: Build credibility through client feedback  🛍️ Healer Shop: Each healer can sell herbal products from their own mini-shop  📚 Healer Blogs & Events: Culturally rich content to engage and educate  🛠️ Admin Tools for Healers: Manage sessions, block off time, track clients  🔗 Google Calendar Sync: Automatically manage healer availability  🛡️ Verification & Approval: Platform verifies healer credentials for patient safety

applications.name: NearCart
applications.description: Small businesses and second-hand sellers often struggle to gain visibility online without paid ads, SEO expertise, or influencer reach. At the same time, nearby buyers don’t realize these sellers exist—even when they offer exactly what they need. NearCart solves this by creating a bridge between undiscovered sellers and local buyers, using real-time location intelligence. This project was inspired by the need to make local commerce truly discoverable—not through algorithms or marketing, but through simple proximity. It’s about turning communities into living marketplaces and giving solo sellers a fair shot at success. NearCart is built for small businesses and startups that struggle to get noticed online, second-hand or individual sellers who want to connect with nearby customers, consumers seeking instant access to local products, and communities that care about shopping sustainably and supporting their neighborhood economy. It’s designed to empower the overlooked, simplify discovery, and strengthen local connections all through the power of proximity. NearCart offers a seamless, hyperlocal shopping experience with features like real-time product search to instantly connect users with nearby sellers, interactive store listings that display distance, prices, and product visuals, and built-in navigation using Google Maps for smooth routing. Even without a specific search, users can browse nearby shops through a discovery mode that acts like a live marketplace map. The app integrates essential APIs for location tracking and inventory access, includes secure authentication with external providers, and was built completely via AI prompt engineering using Bolt AI without writing a single line of traditional code.

applications.description: NutureAI is an AI-powered, culturally-intelligent health companion. It aims to provide health guidance that understands and respects an individual's cultural background, food traditions, and lifestyle preferences.  The problem NutureAI solves is the inadequacy of generic health advice and technology for diverse populations. Many existing health applications recommend approaches that don't align with the cultural practices or traditional healing foods of various communities. This leads to a disconnect where health technology fails to serve the full spectrum of how people live, eat, and find joy in movement. It also fosters community connection, creating a "cultural health village" where users can connect with others who share their background and health journey. The core mission is to ensure that every person receives health guidance that celebrates their culture, rather than erasing it. NutureAI offers three key benefits:  Cultural Adaptation: It honors your food heritage by using AI that understands traditional foods, cooking methods, and cultural health practices from your background. Personalized Coaching: It learns your life, not just data, through adaptive coaching that considers your schedule, preferences, family dynamics, and cultural context. applications.name: Platform for field hockey coaches
applications.description: doHockey is the smart assistant for field hockey coaches. From drag-and-drop lineups to automatic substitution schedules and real-time playtime tracking, it simplifies match-day management. Stay focused on the game—doHockey handles the logistics.  ##Why doHockey? As an amateur field hockey coach, I know how much time and effort goes into managing a team — especially on busy weekends. Planning lineups, tracking playtime, and organizing substitutions often takes more time than the match itself. That’s why I developed doHockey: a practical, time-saving tool designed to take the hassle out of match-day management.  doHockey helps coaches stay focused on the game by handling the logistics. You can easily create lineups with a drag-and-drop interface, automatically generate substitution schedules based on preset intervals, and track each player’s playtime in real time. Whether you want to rotate players every 6 or 9 minutes, or ensure fair playing time for everyone, doHockey makes it simple.  The tool supports standard match settings — four quarters of 17.5 minutes, with up to five reserves — and provides a live dashboard during the match, along with a printable substitution schedule to keep things running smoothly on the sidelines.  doHockey is built for coaches like me, who love the sport but could use a bit of help staying organized. It saves time, reduces stress, and ensures every player gets the attention they deserve.  Inspiration  As an amateur field hockey coach, I often spend more time planning than coaching. Organizing lineups, substitutions, and tracking playtime — especially during weekend matches — can be stressful and inefficient. I wanted a tool to take care of the logistics so I could focus on the team and the game.

applications.name: PolicyGenie

applications.name: Polylogue
applications.description: Polylogue is a community-driven platform that helps people learn languages through comprehensible input — clear, visual, and engaging content that learners can actually understand and absorb in context.  Most language learning tools focus on isolated vocabulary and grammar, but learners often struggle when it’s time to speak or listen. Polylogue solves this by delivering contextualized, level-appropriate stories and animations, supported by images, gestures, and native audio — just like how we naturally acquire language.  Inspired by both research in language acquisition and the lack of quality content for many underserved languages, Polylogue is built for learners of all levels, and especially for those passionate about preserving and using less-resourced languages.  Key features:  Visual stories narrated by native speakers  Multi-language subtitles and translations  Community contributions of recordings and content  Support for all languages, including endangered ones  Built using Supabase, React, and FFmpeg for voice synthesis and content moderation  Polylogue is currently in beta — we’re focused on refining the experience and growing the content through user contributions.

applications.description: Promptivore is an LLM usage tracker with an eco-conscious twist.It tracks your prompt sessions, calculates how many tokens you’ve used, and turns that into real-world environmental impact, like CO₂ estimates and playful “energy equivalents” (e.g. “this prompt = boiling a kettle 3 times”). I built it because nobody really talks about the environmental cost of AI and I wanted a way to track my usage without guilt-tripping myself. It’s for builders, researchers, and curious folks who want visibility into their AI habits and a nudge toward mindful prompting. Powered by Bolt and Supabase. Includes token/session tracking, impact visualisation, personal dashboards, eco-prompt suggestions, and offset tips.

applications.name: Ramp
applications.description: Ramp is an AI-powered onboarding companion for product managers, built to help you gain clarity, get structure, and start delivering value from day one.  I built it because I lived the problem. On my first day as a PM intern, I was handed a product with no documentation, no onboarding, and no real support. Three years and many mentorship conversations later, I realized this is still the norm — especially in fast-paced startups.  Ramp brings structure to those chaotic first weeks. It gives you:  A tailored 3-week onboarding checklist  A real-world “Ask a PM” AI assistant  A library of ready-to-use templates  I built Ramp in a single AI prompt using Bolt, styled with TailwindCSS and powered by GPT-4o logic (coming). It’s fully responsive, requires no login, and is designed for real-world PM struggles — the kind no one prepares you for.  If it helps even one PM feel less lost in their first 90 days, it’s done its job.

applications.name: SKILLSYNC
applications.description: ### **SkillSync – The AI-Powered Career Copilot for Students**    **Problem Solved:** Students and early-career professionals struggle to navigate the overwhelming world of upskilling, internships, and side gigs. Traditional platforms offer fragmented solutions, leaving users to manually hunt for resources, opportunities, and communities.    **Inspiration:** Seeing talented learners waste time searching for the *right* courses, hackathons, or mentors—instead of actually building skills—inspired SkillSync. It’s the tool I wish I had in college!    **For:**   - **Students** seeking internships, hackathons, or skill roadmaps.   - **Self-taught learners** who want curated resources (no more "Which Python course is best?").   - **Freelancers** looking for gigs while upskilling.    **Key Features:**   1. **AI Skill Mapper:** Generates personalized roadmaps with **LinkedIn role models, GitHub repos, Discord communities, and top-rated courses/videos**. *(Example prompt: "I know Python basics—show me open-source projects, free advanced courses, and local hackathons.")*   2. **Internship/Job Aggregator:** Pulls real-time listings from **LinkedIn, Wellfound, and Internshala APIs**.   3. **Hackathon & Freelance Hub:** Tracks global competitions and gigs (e.g., Devpost, Fiverr).   4. **Bias-Resistant:** Focuses on skills, not pedigree.    **Tech Highlights:**   - **AI-Powered:** NLP to match skills (e.g., "Django" ↔ "Backend Development").   - **Live Integrations:** GitHub API for trending repos, Reddit/Discord scrapers for communities.   - **Roadmap.sh-style Visuals:** Interactive skill paths.    **One-Sentence Pitch:**   *"SkillSync is the ChatGPT meets LinkedIn for students—turning ‘How do I start?’ into a step-by-step playbook with AI-curated resources, opportunities, and communities."*    ---   **Why It Works:** It replaces 10+ tabs (Coursera + Reddit + GitHub + Discord) with **one AI-driven command**. 🚀

There's also a special section for kids called Little Joys, plus quick happiness boosters through JoyBurst Sessions. Built with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, SoulSpace offers a responsive, modern design with smooth transitions and interactive elements. It’s lightweight, fast, and easy to customize. Whether you're seeking relaxation, energy, or a mental refresh, SoulSpace offers a peaceful and uplifting experience for all.

Too often, trash piles up in neighborhoods, open sewage goes unnoticed or polluted lakes are ignored - not because people don't care but because they don't know where or how to report it. Safii is here to change that. The lack of a centralized, citizen-driven platform to report and track issues is what inspired me to build Safii. The name "Safii" comes from a Hindi word "Safaii" meaning cleanliness and it reflects a civic movement powered by everyday people.

Selfscapes is intended to help every person reclaim their mental and physical place in the world. You don't have to look outwards, it starts with you. You are your own muse!

The AI won't hang up until there's resolution, but does so with cultural awareness and persuasive charm rather than aggression. It features: Fully Customizable Theatrical Persona - The Poet, Merchant, Storyteller, Philosopher etc all fully controllable via our inbuilt tone sliders.AI-Generated Scripts - Personalized dialogue tailored to each situation depending on lender input. ersistent Calling - Professional calls that continue forever until resolved and the callee pays up.Ethically Compliant - Legally sound, relationship-preserving approach (Friendship sold seperately).

applications.name: SmartHair
applications.description: My wife and I have been together almost twenty years. And for most of that time, she struggled with her hair. She tried everything. Products. Advice. YouTube. Nothing worked. It always felt random. Like a problem no one actually wanted to solve.  One day she turned to me and asked if AI could help. I work in tech, and she was curious about what I do. I ran a quick analysis, built her a routine, and she tried it. And it worked.  She said, “You have to make this into an app. People need this.”  That’s how SmartHair started. It wasn’t about building a business. It was about helping her. It still is.  What it does SmartHair gives you a routine that actually works. You take a photo. You answer one question. That’s it. The app reads your hair and gives you real guidance based on what you actually need.  It’s not about selling products. It’s not a funnel. It doesn’t ask for fifteen minutes of your time. It respects you.  This is for people who are tired of being talked down to. Who don’t want another trendy serum. Who just want to understand their hair and take care of it.

applications.name: SmartMeal AI
applications.description: SmartMeal AI - AI-Powered Meal Planning That Prevents Food Waste The Problem: People waste $1,200+ annually on groceries due to poor meal planning, expired food, and impulse buying. Existing meal planning apps are generic and don't adapt to real user behavior or help prevent waste. The Solution: SmartMeal AI uses artificial intelligence to create personalized meal plans that optimize your existing ingredients, predict what will expire soon, and generate smart shopping lists with price comparisons across stores. Who It's For: Busy professionals, families, and health-conscious individuals who want to save money on groceries while eating better and reducing food waste. Key Features:  AI meal recommendations based on dietary preferences and what's expiring Smart shopping lists with cost optimization and store price comparisons Food waste tracker that suggests leftover transformation recipes Recipe videos with step-by-step cooking guidance Family meal coordination and budget tracking Freemium model: Free (3 meals/week) vs Premium ($9.99/month unlimited)  Why It's Different: Unlike generic meal planners, SmartMeal AI focuses on preventing food waste while saving money - addressing both environmental and financial concerns that resonate with modern consumers.

applications.name: Snap Your Meal

It’s also built for fitness-focused users who want an easier way to estimate calories and plan meals without logging every gram manually.  The app uses AI to:  Recognize ingredients from photos of your food cupboard or fridge  Suggest creative, goal-based recipes tailored to your preferences  Estimate calories and macros from cooked meals  Generate personalized meal plans based on your fitness goals  It was built with React, Supabase, GPT-4 Vision, and Tailwind. AI prompts are carefully engineered to return structured, accurate results—including markdown-formatted recipes and conservative macro breakdowns. Everything is wrapped in a clean, simple UX that works in just a few taps.

applications.name: Street Art Tour
applications.description: Street Art Tour City The Problem: Urban exploration can feel disconnected and directionless. Cities are filled with incredible street art that often goes unnoticed, while tourists and locals alike struggle to discover authentic cultural experiences beyond typical attractions. Traditional tours are expensive and inflexible, operating on rigid schedules that don't accommodate spontaneous exploration. Our solution is an SMS-based scavenger hunt that guides users through urban street art discoveries. The platform uses Twilio for text messaging interactions and Supabase for secure authentication. Users explore cities through graffiti pieces and locations stored in our database, unlocking new experiences at their own pace. We're building organic reach through automatically generated blog content based on our cataloged street art and partnerships. Our partnership pages are already ranking well in Google searches, creating a sustainable growth channel. The platform is fully monetized with Stripe integration for seamless payments. The concept was inspired by a personal experience exploring historic buildings in London, but evolved to focus specifically on street art to create a more vibrant, contemporary urban adventure.

applications.name: Symbione - Feel The World Emotions
applications.description: Symbione was born out of emotional exhaustion, not excitement. While the world faced crisis after crisis—from the unrest in Manipur to global tragedies—there was no platform that truly captured the emotional state of the world. News overwhelmed us but never asked: how does the world feel right now?  We built Symbione for those who want more than just headlines, for those who want to feel the news, not just read it.  What makes it special?  Symbione maps global news into a 3D emotional space using AI, sentiment analysis, and data from platforms like Reddit, grouped by emotions like joy, fear, anger, and hope. It’s not just a feed; it’s a visual, emotional landscape. Users can explore stories, save them to the Cosmark (an AI-powered research space), and interact with an emotional assistant for deeper understanding.  Symbione is for the emotionally curious, the thinkers, the feelers, the ones seeking connection in a disconnected world.

applications.name: Synclinic
applications.description: The inspiration for Synclinic came from witnessing the struggle patients and doctors face in accessing and managing quality healthcare—especially in regions where resources are limited. Too often, patients must wait days for basic advice, and doctors are overloaded with manual tasks. I wanted to build a platform that truly bridges this gap, making healthcare more accessible, efficient, and community-driven.  Who is it for?  Synclinic is built for both patients and doctors.  Patients benefit from instant access to an AI-powered medical assistant, Agatha Christine, who provides personalized health tips, preliminary assessments, and support 24/7.  Doctors get a secure, intuitive dashboard to manage patient records, send prescriptions, update health information, and communicate easily—all while maintaining the highest standards of privacy.  Key Features & Integrations:  AI Assistant (Agatha Christine): Doctors can train and update the AI for improved and safe analysis. Patients get tailored recommendations and fast answers.  Community Experience: Patients can share their health journeys, support each other, and learn from collective experiences—vital in countries where hospitals are scarce.  Doctor & Patient Dashboards: Secure record-keeping, real-time messaging, appointment management, and more.  Pandemic-ready: Enables remote triage, care, and support during health crises.  Integrations: Built on Supabase for secure storage & authentication, OpenAI for smart AI chat, and ElevenLabs for natural voice interactions.

applications.name: TabSquad
applications.description: We've all been there - that awkward moment trying to remember who owes what from last weekend's dinner. TabSquad eliminates friendship friction by making shared expenses completely transparent.  Unlike apps that only handle money, TabSquad tracks everything: cash, favors, borrowed items. Our intuitive tab system organizes balances by group - "Pizza Night," "Trip Expenses" - with one-tap settlements and real-time updates.  Built by a father-sons developer team who experienced these problems firsthand, we're daily users solving our own real frustrations.  The result? Stronger friendships through clearer communication. When everyone knows who owes what, nobody has to guess.  Built with Bolt.new

applications.name: The Watcher - Stay Ahead of Any Topic

TheWatcher solves this by letting you choose exactly what you want to track—like "Tesla stock" or "AI research papers" or "MLB Transfers" and then our AI  system monitors engine continuosly watches the entire internet for you. Whenever anything major happens in your Topic, it sends you clean, focused updates only on the subjects you picked, so you never miss anything important and skip all the noise.  Key features include smart insights and updates, customizable update intervals, and a user-friendly interface plus mobile app soon being built using bolt.new for mobile push notifications. Behind the scenes, it is built using Bolt.new with integrations like Supabase for Database and Auth, Stripe For a credit-based pricing system that’s both fair and flexible, and Deployed to Netlify.  TheWatcher is for anyone who wants to stay ahead like professionals, researchers, journalists, content creators, or anyone tired of information overload.

applications.name: URHeard AI
applications.description: The inspiration for URHeard AI came from witnessing the broken state of traditional hiring processes. As persons who have been on both sides of the interview table, We noticed several critical pain points:  Time Inefficiency: HR teams spending 40+ hours per hire on initial screenings Inconsistent Evaluation: Different interviewers asking different questions, leading to unconscious bias Poor Candidate Experience: Long wait times and impersonal processes driving away top talent Scalability Issues: Companies struggling to handle high-volume hiring while maintaining quality The name "URHeard" reflects our core mission: ensuring every candidate feels truly heard and evaluated fairly, regardless of who's conducting the interview. We wanted to create a solution that would democratize the hiring process while maintaining the human touch that candidates deserve.

applications.name: YouLookedAt.me
applications.description: A missed connection is when two people briefly cross paths, feel a possible connection, but don’t get the chance to talk further or exchange contact information.  I once had a brief interaction with a girl. We smiled at each other. I saw her again on a beach, but I wasn’t confident enough to approach her. I didn’t know her name, who her friends were, or where she studied. It was a huge city, and I knew the chances of ever seeing her again were slim unless destiny had something planned. But I wasn’t that lucky. I never saw her again.  Even now, that moment stays with me. I often wonder how two strangers who felt something could they ever find each other again. If they don’t know names, addresses, or any personal details. That question stayed with me and eventually sparked the idea for this project.  YouLookedAt.me is a platform where you can share your missed connection moment. If someone else posts a story that matches yours, you’ll be notified and can start a chat. It’s a space to share real, heartfelt stories, post anonymous notes, and maybe even reconnect with someone you briefly crossed paths with.  It’s all about second chances and real stories because sometimes destiny just needs a little help.

applications.name: elucidare: every feature is designed with neurodiverse professionals in mind
applications.description: 20% of the population is neurodiverse. There is up to a 40% unemployment rate among neurodiverse adults. And over 60% of employed neurodiverse professionals experience workplace stigma.   Elucidare are the world's first AI-powered communication tools designed specifically for neurodiverse professionals.   They help transforms workplace anxiety into workplace confidence through three core features:  (1) Tone Analyzer: analyzes incoming messages and breaks down the emotional tone with precision. No more spending hours overthinking a simple Slack message.  (2) Script Generator: generates three perfectly tailored response options for any workplace situation. Describe your scenario and receive direct response scripts with explanations of why each approach works.  (3) VoicePractice (Premium) converts your scripts to natural speech using advanced AI voices, letting you rehearse important conversations and emails before sending them. Practice your tone, timing and delivery until you feel confident.  The app tracks the users usage, saves successful scripts to a personal library and learns their communication style, creating a personalized toolkit that grows more valuable over time.  Built entirely inside Bolt.new as a solo developer, Elucidare showcases the power of modern AI-assisted development. This full-stack app demonstrates what's possible when neurodiverse minds meet cutting-edge tools.
